description: A city built on water known for its shipbuilding industry and canals. The Straw Hats are recovering here after the Enies Lobby battle.

keyEvents.title: Garp Reveals He is Luffy's Grandfather
keyEvents.description: In Water Seven, Garp confirms his relationship to Luffy in front of the Straw Hats and Marines.
keyEvents.significance: Water Seven becomes the location where Luffy learns major truths about his family.

keyEvents.title: Dragon Revealed as Luffy's Father
keyEvents.description: Garp accidentally reveals that Dragon is Luffy's father while in Water Seven.
keyEvents.significance: One of the most important revelations in the series occurs in this location.

description: Known as the 'Town of the Beginning and the End,' this is where Gol D. Roger was born and executed. Luffy visited before entering the Grand Line.

keyEvents.title: Flashback: Dragon Saved Luffy Here
keyEvents.description: A flashback reveals that Dragon was present in Loguetown and helped Luffy escape from Smoker after the mysterious lightning strike.
keyEvents.significance: Recontextualizes the events of the Loguetown arc, revealing Dragon's intervention.

statusHistory.reason: Town continues to operate as a Marine base
